content: this a simple to knit owl and there is no tricky colour-work as the features are embroidered after knitting using swiss darning also known as duplicate stitch a chart is included in the pattern for the colour-work designed by amanda berry @fluffandfuzz the owl is knitted in wool/alpaca blend aran weight yarns on single pointed needles not in the round **needles** a pair of 4 5mm single pointed knitting needles us 7 **recommended yarn** drops nepal 65% wool/35% alpaca in shades grey mix 0501 white 1101 and goldenrod 2923 **notions** tapestry needle a handful of toy filling and two 6mm beads or toy safety eyes **sizes** one size only - 10cm tall x 9cm wide **techniques** for beginners and above other techniques used include seaming increases and decreases **pattern info** this knitting pattern is a pdf download 3 pages and written in english patterns for personal use only not for resale copyright © 2016 amanda berry all rights reserved
